name: molecu-library
description: Proyecto de una librer√≠a con front en Nuxt y Back en Molecular
author: abbytec

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:front
scripts.start: concurrently "PORT=8181 npm run start:api" "npm run start:front"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=shared && rm -rf apps/*/dist apps/*/node_modules/.cache
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run build:shared && npm install --workspace=api && npm install --workspace=frontend
scripts.deploy:setup: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build
